alert.note: Alert for Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 27 at 2:54AM EST until January 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The east slopes of the Berkshires. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions overspread the region Sunday morning and continue Sunday night. The snow should taper off to lighter snow showers early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heavy wet snow will bring the potential for power outages.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
